page.title: 16HINCKLEY LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: { The Leisure Centre}in Hinckley is one of the best in Great Britain .It is seven years old and in 1977 cost Â£2 million.Today it would cost four times that.It is owned by the council and used by half million people each year. The activities are for people of all ages, and include squash,table tennis, badminton, yoga, tennis, volleyball, soccer,archery,rounders and swimming. Swimming is the most popular sport; there are three pools, a beginners pool ,a family pool and a diving pool. There is a weights room and keep fit class for those wanting to keep trim and to relax a solarium or sauna. The centre also provides a cafeteria and bar for spectators use also.Small children can play safely supervised in a creche. Many famous people come to the centre for matches,competitions and concerts.
